1511790.name: BRUTALIST
1511790.description:
There is a world among you, a world that consists of abandoned concrete jungles, full of mysteries, dangers and secret passages. Your main enemy is polluted air, so along the way you will have to look for oxygen cylinders, this will add to the challenge!

Somewhere far away, there is a green paradise, but can you reach it?

The main feature and idea of ​​the BRUTALIST is to enjoy the environment, especially for fans of post-apocalypse and minimalist concrete architecture. Narration through the environment, that's what awaits you.

Main features of the Game:

  • No mini map or flashing pointers on the whole screen, just environment and the goal of going to the green oasis while exploring the mystery of the dead concrete world.

  • The element of survival is the need for oxygen, collect cylinders with this source of life along your path, go in the wrong direction - most likely you will lose...

  • For greater immersion in the world, game does not have a classic interface, the only indicator is the oxygen level on the cylinder behind the player.

  • The world is also dangerous with many sources of radiation, the main character has a counter, it will show with a sound signal how close you are to death.

  • Collect bits of the history of the world from the environment, and you will find out what happened.
1511790.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 乌克兰语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 日语, 波兰语
